detail_desc: Fleece-lined mittens in wind- and waterproof functional fabric with closed seams. Reflective details and an elasticated strap with a press-stud at the wrists, and narrow elastication around the tops. The mittens have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Fleece-lined mittens in wind- and waterproof functional fabric with closed seams. Reflective details and an elasticated strap with a press-stud at the wrists, and narrow elastication around the tops. The mittens have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
